basics.label: Branch Manager/Operations Manager
basics.summary: Skilled at identifying customer needs and presenting appropriate company product and service offerings. Demonstrated ability to address customer concerns, analyze situational elements, and provide effective responses and solutions. Proficient skills to communicate orally and in writing. Expertise in resolving escalated customer service issues. Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite. Knowledgeable and innovative finance, sales and marketing professional whose success is based on integrity, exceptional customer service, efficiency and ambition.

work.name: Unspecified Company
work.summary: Taught a variety of banking-related courses for adult continuing-education classes affiliated with Alvernia College and Reading Area Community College. Had 15+ years of experience as the accountant/business manager for Fleetwood Bible Church, responsible for the management of a $500,000 annual budget.
highlights: Using Excel, I created and maintained detailed financial accounting and reporting forms and documents.
Prepared all cash receipts and cash disbursements, maintained and prepared financial statements for church board and congregation.
Maintained all loan and deposit banking relationships.
Was responsible for payroll preparation for all staff.
Had 26 years banking experience, in the fields of credit investigation and approval and branch management.

work.name: Unspecified Company
work.summary: Reviewed and analyzed unsettled claims to determine suitability for submission for arbitration.
highlights: Investigated facts of loss, evidence, and documentation to understand claim occurrence.
Prepared contentions and evidence to present to Arbitration Forums to demonstrate most effective and compelling case for insured's interest.
Prepared monthly reports for management concerning arbitration submissions, amendments, and decisions.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversaw seven claim handlers and provided instruction, coaching, and supervision to promote optimal performance by direct-reports and to assure excellence and competence in customer service provided.
highlights: Determined team objectives and formulated /implemented actions to encourage performance and development of team members.
